GreetingMessages: Howdy {name}, what a dumb name!  Let's get going!
Hey {name}, welcome to your life journey!
Nice to meet you, {name}! Let's explore your potential lifespan.
Greetings, {name}! Ready to peek into your future?
LifeExpectancyResponses: This is your incept date. Things are fine, just fine! {date}
Your journey ends on {date}. Buckle up!
Mark your calendar: {date} is the big day!
